name: Gomu Gomu no Mi
description: Allows the user's body to stretch like rubber.

name: Mera Mera no Mi
description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into fire at will.

name: Hito Hito no Mi, Model: Daibutsu
description: Allows the user to transform into a Daibutsu (giant golden Buddha).

name: Tori Tori no Mi, Model: Phoenix
description: Allows the user to transform into a phoenix, granting flight and regenerative abilities.

name: Soru Soru no Mi
description: Allows the user to interact with and manipulate souls.

name: Gura Gura no Mi
description: Allows the user to create powerful shockwaves, causing earthquakes.

name: Ope Ope no Mi
description: Allows the user to create a spherical territory in which they can manipulate objects and people.

name: Bara Bara no Mi
description: Allows the user to split their body into separate pieces and control them independently.

name: Sube Sube no Mi
description: Makes the user's body smooth and slippery, causing most attacks to slide off.

name: Moku Moku no Mi
description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into smoke.

name: Magu Magu no Mi
description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into magma.

name: Gasu Gasu no Mi
description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into gas.

name: Yami Yami no Mi
description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into darkness.

name: Pika Pika no Mi
description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into light.

name: Hie Hie no Mi
description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into ice.

name: Goro Goro no Mi
description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into electricity.

name: Suna Suna no Mi
description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into sand.

name: Ito Ito no Mi
description: Allows the user to create and manipulate strings.

name: Bomu Bomu no Mi
description: Allows the user's body and secretions to explode without harm to the user.

name: Doku Doku no Mi
description: Allows the user to create and control various types of poison.

name: Kage Kage no Mi
description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into shadows.

name: Yuki Yuki no Mi
description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into snow.

name: Mushi Mushi no Mi, Model: Kabuto
description: Allows the user to transform into a kabuto beetle.

name: Ame Ame no Mi
description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into candy.

name: Ryu Ryu no Mi, Model: Pteranodon
description: Allows the user to transform into a pteranodon.

name: Nikyu Nikyu no Mi
description: Allows the user to repel things with great force by touching them.

name: Toge Toge no Mi
description: Allows the user to produce sharp spikes from their body.

name: Hana Hana no Mi
description: Allows the user to grow extra limbs or body parts from any surface they touch.

name: Baku Baku no Mi
description: Allows the user to eat anything and transform it into another object or material.

name: Mero Mero no Mi
description: Allows the user to turn people into stone by making them fall in love with them.

name: Saba Saba no Mi
description: Allows the user to turn their body into rust.

name: Zou Zou no Mi, Model: Mammoth
description: Allows the user to transform into a mammoth.
